mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user,update_user, status) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT d.*,c.name AS categoryName FROM dish d LEFT JOIN category c ON d.category_id = c.id WHERE d.id= #{id}
